Package logic

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
logic.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler extends Object

This class stores a variety of methods to process various actions in the program flow. Less of an object for a concept, more of a class for logic subroutines. Used to process actions done by a farmer object. Also used for error messages, and choice logic.

Since:
2022-11-07

      This method handles the logic when a farmer interacts with an unplowed plot
      Parameters:
      nCode - user selection code
      tempPlot - the plot being interacted with
      farmer - the player object interacting

    • plotIsPlowedLogic

      public void plotIsPlowedLogic(int nCode, PlotLand tempPlot, Farmer farmer, int currentDay, ArrayList<logic.Crop> cropBook)
      This method handles the logic when a farmer interacts with a plowed plot
      Parameters:
      nCode - user selection code
      tempPlot - the plot being interacted with
      farmer - the player object interacting
      currentDay - the current day in the game world
      cropBook - holds a "database" of crops programmed in the game

    • seedChoiceLogic

      public boolean seedChoiceLogic(PlotLand tempPlot, Farmer farmer, int currentDay, logic.Crop crop, ArrayList<String> tempMsgs)
      This method handles the logic when a farmer plants a seed into a plot
      Parameters:
      tempPlot - the plot being interacted with
      farmer - the player object interacting
      currentDay - the current day in the game world
      crop - the crop object
      tempMsgs - the ArrayList containing the messages to be displayed
      Returns:
      boolean whether the action was successful or not

      public int isValidYN(char cCode)
      This method handles the logic when a user is prompted with Y/N questions
      Parameters:
      cCode - user selection code
      Returns:
      int if yes 1, no 0, else -1
